pages.title: Sei Whale
pages.text: The sei whale ($(o) SAY, Norwegian: [sæɪ]; Balaenoptera borealis$()) is a baleen whale, the third-largest rorqual after the blue whale and the fin whale.$(br2)It inhabits most oceans and adjoining seas, and prefers deep offshore waters.$(br2)It avoids polar and tropical waters and semi-enclosed bodies of water.

pages.title: Sei Whale
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★★☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
